Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (IRPR) s.4
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Genuineness of marriage at time of interview
Crimes.Application_Error: Focus on marriage inception instead of current status
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Potential degradation of memory due to delay
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Delay in decision-making and misapplication of assessment standard
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Remitted to another officer for reassessment
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on notes after long delay
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Breach due to delay and narrow assessment
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Officer failed to assess credibility based on current evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Unreasonable delay and failure to consider relevant factors
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to assess marriage status at time of interview
